original_text: And Joseph was thirty years old when he stood before Pharaoh king of Egypt. And Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh, and went throughout all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 요셉이 애굽 왕 바로 앞에 설 때에 삼십 세라 그가 바로 앞을 떠나 애굽 온 땅을 순찰하니

sentences.original_text: And Joseph was thirty years old
when he stood before Pharaoh king of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이집트 왕 파라오 앞에 섰을 때였다

sentences.original_text: And Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh
and went throughout all the land of Egypt
